attributes.action: RETURN MY DAUGHTER TO MY CARE
attributes.additional_details:
I WANT THE GOVERNMENT TO RETURN MY DAUGHTER MEGAN TO MY CARE. I AM HER MOTHER AND SHE HAS THE RIGHT TO BE WITH ME.
THE AMOUNT OF INJUSTICE IN THIS COUNTRY IS INCREASING WHERE CHILDREN ARE CONCERNED.
THE FAMILY COURTS ARE NOT TREATING CHILDREN CORRECTLY AND ARE NOT WORKING IN THEIR BEST INTEREST. URGENT ACTION NEEDS TO BE TAKEN. THIS MUST STOP.RETURN MY DAUGHTER TO MY CARE.
